name: @dataforsyningen/saul
description: This is a collection of stand-alone methods for photogrammetry calculations and API interactions for 'Danske Skråfotos'.

scripts.test: echo 'Tests require Node.js >= 18.0.0' && node ./test/saul-projection.test.js && node ./test/saul-core.test.js && node ./test/saul-combined.test.js && node ./test/saul-elevation.test.js
